entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add rich type for reading X509 Authority Information Access #68792
    7.0.0
  • Make DynamicMethod invokable "directly" #68791
  • Requires on NativeAOT has problems with CompilerGeneratedCode #68786
  • Skip finding subcaptures when position is known from top level match in RegexOptions.NonBacktracking #68783
  • JIT: force assert for noway during SPMI replay #68781
    7.0.0
  • JIT: leverage rolling jit builds to create a bisection utility #68780
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Create an interface for types with not-null returning ToString #68779
  • Follow-up work for PartitionedRateLimiter #68776
    7.0.0
  • Support AOT that target shared libraries on Mono for the .NET 7 time frame #68775
  • SequenceReader<T>.Rewind(0) causes TryRead() to throw IndexOutOfRangeException #68774
  • CI: wasm.build.tests.satelliteassembliestests.resourcesfrommainassembly CI failure on Linux #68773
  • [API Proposal]: Add API to check if process had administrator privileges #68770
  • Assertion failed '(l2 < optLoopCount) || (l2 == BasicBlock::NOT_IN_LOOP)' during 'Do value numbering' #68769
  • [API Proposal]: Additional span overloads for asymmetric signing and encryption #68767
    7.0.0
  • Thousands of analyzer warnings are thrown inside Visual Studio #68764
    7.0.0
  • .NET 6.0.4 incorrect profiler callback sequence (CRITICAL) #68760
    7.0.0
  • DateTime.Now from .NET 6 will return UTC time, not local time in docker engine on CentOS #68759
  • Mono interpreter: Wrong stack size calculation of basic blocks #68757
    7.0.0
  • Segfault inside JIT in libraries-jitstress #68756
  • NativeAOT: Garbage collector seems to not reclaim quickly #68754

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Improve reflection types - add not-null properties #68789
  • System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.RegexMatchTests.Match_InstanceMethods_DefaultTimeout_Throws failing on CoreCLR checked runs #67886
  • Productize LibraryImportGenerator for use outside of runtime #60595
    7.0.0
  • Potential BSOD in Libraries Test Run release coreclr windows x64 Release #67105
  • Assertion failed 'node->DefinesLocalAddr(this, size, &lcl, nullptr) && lvaGetDesc(lcl)->lvHiddenBufferStructArg' #68669
    7.0.0
  • EventListener.OnEventSourceCreated invoked before constructor #63979
    7.0.0
  • EventSource fails to escape events with `<` #50892
    7.0.0
  • Contention in coreclr.dll!EventPipeBufferManager::AllocateBufferForThread #65247
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.TelemetryTest_Http20.EventSource_ConnectionPoolAtMaxConnections_LogsRequestLeftQueue #67273
    Future
  • Pass UseStrongCrypto to server-side TLS #68318
    7.0.0
  • Building Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.Abstractions fails in VS #67091
    7.0.0
  • Visual Studio restore is broken as projects are missing from the dependency closure #65552
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Memory.ReadOnlySpan #61679
    7.0.0
  • The msftbot account locking conversations is annoying #68740
  • [API Proposal]: Make some System.Net.Security functions/properties public for System.Net.Quic #67552
    7.0.0
  • Document and/or change the relation between PGO and AggressiveOptimization #62148
    7.0.0
  • 1ES Pools often run out of space #60610
  • Test failure: System.Net.NameResolution.PalTests.NameResolutionPalTests.TryGetAddrInfo_ExternalHost(justAddresses: False) #57054
    Future
  • [WinHttpHandler] Test failed: ReadAsStreamAsync_StreamCanReadIsFalseAfterDispose #57626
    Future
  • [WinHttpHandler] System.Net.Http.WinHttpHandler.Functional.Tests crashing with assertion failed #57737
    Future
  • Test failure: PostAsyncNonDuplex_ServerCompletesResponseBodyThenResetsStreamWithNoError_SuccessAndRequestBodyCancelled #58624
    Future
  • Test failure: PreAuthenticate_FirstRequestNoHeader_SecondRequestVariousStatusCodes_ThirdRequestPreauthenticates #58625
    Future
  • Test failure: PostAsyncExpect100Continue_NonSuccessResponse_RequestBodyNotSent #58629
    Future
  • Test failure: KeepAlivePingDelay_Infinite_NoKeepAlivePingIsSent #58724
    Future
  • Test failure: GetAsyncWithRedirect_SetCookieContainer_CorrectCookiesSent #58725
    Future
  • System.Net.Quic.Functional.Tests timing out #64944
    7.0.0
  • System.Net.Security.Tests CertificateValidationRemoteServer_EndToEnd_Ok failing on Windows 7 #65168
    7.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SocketsHttpHandler_HttpClientHandler_SslProtocols_Test.GetAsync_SupportedSSLVersion_Succeeds(sslProtocols: Tls11, url: \"https://www.ssllabs.com:10302/\") #67682
    7.0.0
  • Test failure：System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.PlatformHandler_HttpClientHandler_SslProtocols_Http2_Test.GetAsync_SupportedSSLVersion_Succeeds(sslProtocols: Tls11, url: \"https://www.ssllabs.com:10302/\") #67685
    7.0.0
  • Unsafe.AsRef cannot be used with ref structs #68709
  • Build a Windows 7 compatible Single-file AppHost #13356
    Future
  • dotnet-dump in AKS sidecar using alpine base images results in "ReadProcessMemory" FAILED #66001
    7.0.0
  • QUIC: revisit support for ServerCertificateContext #53507
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Add a four-element AsyncLocalValueMap type #68790
    area-System.Threading, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [PERF][MAUI] Update iOS result and post command #68788
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Add leg to build wasm with threading enabled #68787
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Create infra-labels.md #68785
    area-Meta
  • [System.Native] (wasm) use a temporary buffer if threading is used #68784
    arch-wasm, area-System.Security
  • Add SlidingWindow and FixedWindow to RateLimitPartition #68782
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Revise OSR docs #68778
  • Update comments and simplify implementation of ResourceManager.IsDefault #68777
    area-System.Resources
  • Merge several version of MsQuicStream SendAsync code #68772
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Remove some unnecessary StringBuilder use #68768
    area-Meta
  • Remove REGEX_OPTIONS from TextFieldParser.vb #68766
    area-Microsoft.VisualBasic
  • [wasm] Bump emscripten to 3.1.9 #68765
    area-Build-mono
  • 49936 text json failures #68758
    area-System.Text.Json

Merged

  • Clean up some ActiveIssues in regex #68657
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Remove GTF_GLOB_REF on a few more addressing nodes #68741
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move EventPipe thread buffer allocation outside of lock #67936
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix expected number of RequestLeftQueue events in telemetry test. #68771
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Pass UseStrongCrypto to server-side TLS #68704
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Delete some unused wrappers for registry operations #68689
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Bump Intellisense package to Preview 3 #68713
    documentation, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Update solution files to include missing deps #68668
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Adding the 2-parameter xplat shuffle helpers and accelerating them #68559
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • fix build for musl 1.2.3 #67772
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use 'unsigned short' instead of 'unsigned'. #68190
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Avoid delegate allocation per LowLevelLock #68751
    area-System.Threading
  • Avoid unnecessary closure/delegate for new SocketsHttpHandler connections #68750
    area-System.Net.Http, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Avoid delegate allocation in NamedPipeClientStream.ConnectAsync #68752
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • avoid Reflection in Quic #68189
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Remove unnecessary throwOnPrematureClosure in ManagedWebSocket. #68745
    area-System.Net

Updated

  • Add a document describing how to triage CI test failures #68682
  • Update arm/arm64 Linux cross build images #68561
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • Mitigate stress hangs by marking GC-sensitive tests as out-of-proc #68733
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Dynamically sized stacks in EventPipe buffer manager #68134
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Delete unmanaged AssemblyName parser #68737
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Blazor Hybrid iOS & Mac Catalyst Performance Profiling #68685
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add UseSystemd() and UseWindowsService() IServiceCollection extension methods #68580
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Add IL Emit support for MethodInfo.Invoke() #67917
    area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Regenerate fabricbot config to include several new/revised automation tasks #68728
    area-Meta, 7.0.0
  • Detect truncated GZip streams #61768
    area-System.IO.Compression, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Use x64 directory if running x64 process on arm64 apphost #68583
    Servicing-consider, area-Host, 6.0.x
  • Improve impPopCallArgs #68736
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Physical value numbering #68712
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [debugger] First draft of managed debugger on wasi #67272
    area-Debugger-mono, no-recent-activity
  • Treat System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe as intrinsic #68739
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • regenerate networking ref assemblies #68630
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Removed JIT (uint) cast workaround to elide bound-checks in CoreLib #67448
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Ensure that InstructionSetFlags are correctly fixed up for unmatched VM #64158
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add support for storing method handle histograms in profiles #67919
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add support for delegate GDV and method-based vtable GDV #68703
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix some incorrect SpecialFolder entries for Unix #68610
    area-System.Runtime, breaking-change, os-linux, os-mac-os-x, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Improve `CreateDirectory` on Windows #66754
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [debugger] Fix debugging wasm sample #68421
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [Infrastructure] Update devcontainer #67656
    area-Infrastructure
  • Detect the default locale name during startup on Apple platforms #68706
    area-System.Globalization
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Annotating System.Text.Json library for aot form factor #68464
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [draft] JSImportGenerator #66304
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix in-process decoding of DateTime in EventSource #68352
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 6.0.x
  • Move away from exposing internal EventPipe wait handle to EventPipeEventDispatcher. #68320
    area-Tracing-coreclr, area-Tracing-mono
  • [release/6.0] Fix JIT using too wide indirections when returning small structs #68379
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][eventpipe] Implementing MethodDetails and BulkType events #68571
    area-Tracing-mono, needs-author-action
  • [release/6.0] Fix passing too small args for PUTARG_STK on macOS arm64 ABI #68113
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WIP] wasm app host #68696
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Convert RsaPaddingProcessor to statics #68749
    area-System.Security
  • Use RunContinuationsAsynchronously for block completion tasks #61140
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Optimize bswap+mov to movbe on xarch #66965
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • runtime: add RIDs for anolis distro #66132
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Nullable annotations for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #67198
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Add document describing how to disable tests #68727
  • Add X86Serialize hardware intrinsic. #68677
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • `PUTARG_STK`/x86: mark `push [mem]` candidates reg optional #68641
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Handle "mis-sized" structs in XARCH `PUTARG_STK` codegen #68611
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Avoid string-related allocation from GetCSharpString in XML serializer #68738
    area-Serialization, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Start morphing `TYP_STRUCT` local indirections in `LocalAddressVisitor` #68515
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Adds Range Manipulation APIs for Collection<T> and ObservableCollection<T> #65101
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Do not discard byref zeros in `native int + byref` additions #68086
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Copy propagate on `LCL_FLD`s #68592
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Morph `ASG(ONE_FLD_STRUCT, CALL)` using `BITCAST` #61049
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • First commit for ppc64le support #67378
    area-Build-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [Mono]: Fix static closed delegate fnptr crash. #68701
    area-Interop-mono
  • Unify SendContent cancellation between HTTP3 and HTTP2 #67954
    area-System.Net.Http
  • refactor SslStream internals #68678
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Fix ProcessorCount calculation on Windows 11 #68639
    area-System.Threading
  • Adding generic-math support for CLong and CULong #68673
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • ARM64 - Consolidate 'msub' and 'madd' logic #68363
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Source Generator] Can I generate a nuget package using source generator #61096
  • Allow the language version for generated files to 'float' #61094
  • Code Cleanup unexpectedly runs the Edit and Continue analyzer #61082
  • Add tests for code action priority #61081
    Backlog

Closed

  • Ensure that exact number of arguments are given for diagnostic message #60862
    Compiler.Next
  • Pass fallback options to code generation features #60794
    Backlog
  • Replace method with property refactoring does not respect nested types #37991
    Backlog
  • Source Generators: Timing APIs #59398
    17.2
  • Warning CS8524 displayed on custom enum #61087
  • Intellisense text recognition issues when editing C # code #61089
  • [LSP] Implement `workspace/semanticTokens/refresh` #60441
    17.3
  • Roslyn null refs in RuleSetEventHandler.Unregister #60980
    17.3

PullRequests

Created

  • Simplify initialization logic #61100
    Area-IDE
  • Simplify common CWT pattern #61099
    Area-IDE
  • Enable semantic token LSP integration tests + re-enable quick info tests #61098
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Remove InferredIndentationDocumentOptionsProviderFactory #61093
    Area-IDE
  • Move usings on paste off the UI thread #61092
    Area-IDE
  • Remove Razor line document options provider service #61091
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev16.9-vs-deps to release/dev16.11-vs-deps #61085
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #61097
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • [semi-auto-props]: Add PROTOTYPE comments for test cases #61038
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #61095
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Follow ISyntaxFacts pattern #61084
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.2 #61059
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Return a mock of IGlobalOptionsService to Razor tests #61083
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Verify arguments length for diagnostic messages #60925
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Code generator fallback options #60882
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #61058
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add some tests for "Replace methods with property" refactoring #61086
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Implement source generator timing APIs #60267
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, Next
  • Cherry-Pick 60973 To 17.2 #60999
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge, auto-merge
  • Update config for VS branch snap #61051
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Support ref field declarations from source and metadata #60416
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove all remaining MyCodeAction types in the repo #61079
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add null check #61078
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #61077
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #61102
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.2 #61101
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Enable declaration, implementation(in non-interfaces) and consumption of virtual static members. #60965
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Default Interface Impl, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Add EA layer for ASP.NET Core. #60948
    Area-IDE
  • Fix compiler warning reported for target-typed new under collection initializer #61040
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Code style to convert byte arrays to UTF8 strings #60647
    Area-IDE
  • Snippets: If snippet and use of LSP's SnippetExpander #60860
    Area-IDE
  • Fix XmlTextAttribute space normalization #61012
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix assertion failure for optional VB attribute with invalid type #60924
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix assertion failure for optional VB attribute with invalid type (Approach 2) #60933
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Record read of ref local even if value is discarded #60910
    Area-Compilers
  • [semi-auto-props]: Support assigning properties from constructor #60601
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Backport build yml and publishing script changes #61043
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use property pattern #61062
    Area-IDE
  • Remove extra new line character from end of file #61056
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Remove unused private members #61064
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Null annotate ISymbol.ContainingSymbol #58340

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `[FromBody]Stream body` not supported in Minimal APIs #41486
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #41482
  • Mariner queue crash in Microsoft.AspNetCore.SignalR.Common.Tests #41481
  • Serving RCL Static Assets with the _content/LibraryName prefix #41480
  • MultipartReader - BodyLengthLimit is not the total length #41479
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Perf improvement: https, plainTextSansFilter #41472
  • Plz include solution for #37323 also in .Net 6 #41471
  • Add `ObjectHttpResult` likes the `ObjectResult` #41470
  • "@ref" can not get correct value #41469

Closed

  • Add HTTP status code 499 Client Closed Connection #41475
  • Add method to Results/TypedResults to allow creating a ContentHttpResult with a custom status code #41444
    7.0-preview5
  • Perf improvement: plaintext_netty #41445
  • Perf regression: plaintext #41473
  • W3CLogging file rotation seems to be deleting files out of order #41326
    7.0-preview5
  • Using filter (IRouteHandlerFilter) in minimal API throws exception #41464
  • Blank AspNetCore SpaProxy template doesn't run #41474
    Backlog
  • Web Api properties of type long (Int64) are incorrectly serialized by some rounding #41463
  • Blazor time to first UI regression: blazorwasmbenchmark #41347
    .NET 7 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Component Governance alerts #41485
  • Give `$(DotnetEfVersion)` readable casing #41484
    area-infrastructure
  • Spruce up OpenApiSchema generation #41468
    area-web-frameworks

Merged

  • Added overloads on Results/TypedResults for Content/Text with status code #41452
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview5
  • !fixup! Reference Html.Abstractions projects #41413
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview5
  • Determine next log file number from directory on first run #41375
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview5
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `bf66935` to `8ded48c` #41477
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview5
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `800ef58` to `d80c38f` #41476
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview5
  • Minor TagHelper refactoring #41454
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 7.0-preview5

Updated

  • Allow sidebar to scroll for tall menus #41062
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • [release/5.0] Fix CompGov bugs #41179
    area-infrastructure, 5.0.x
  • Surrogate argument list in Minimal APIs #41325
    area-web-frameworks
  • Sync shared code from runtime #41458
    area-runtime
  • [release/3.1] Fix component government bugs #41160
    area-infrastructure, 3.1.x
  • Http Response fails when writing more than 255MB #41239
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add support for RouteHandlerInvocationContext<> overloads #41406
    area-web-frameworks
  • Add rule to seal internal and private types #41457
    area-infrastructure
  • Don't allocate method name strings in protocol #41465
    area-signalr

Closed

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Navbar title color differs on Android and Windows #6761
  • PushModal on Windows does not show back button #6760
  • Error running an iOS Native View #6757
  • "requestLayout() improperly called" warnings spamming output #6755
  • Error In reading and writing file in Android Emulator and windows from Maui project. #6754
  • Android : Resources/appicon.svg cannot be moved to Resources/Images/appicon.svg #6753
  • TabbedPage Indicates Multiple Item Selection #6751
  • Fix timing issue on iOS with setting Accessibility Traits #6750
    .NET 7
  • Shell does not provide way to change toolbar properties such as font weight, size, family, alignment, background color, etc. #6748
  • .NET MAUI Shell - TabBar - Tab IsVisible property binding not working properly on Windows platform #6746
  • Working alternative for PlatformImage for Maui.Graphics.IImage for Windows? #6742
  • Shell Tabbed App - can't change color for items placed in more items menu #6740
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Change the flyout icon color #6738
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Wrong underline under TitleView on iOS #6735
    6.0.300
  • Shell FlyoutContent wrong position on iOS #6734
  • Switching language on Android results in a crash while navigating if resource manager used (i18n) #6732
    6.0.300-servicing
  • RC2 - The Grid keeps a height and width at 0 ignoring FillAndExpand #6731
    6.0.300
  • Element Effect does't aply first time (some initialization issue) #6729
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Enabling CheckBox does not change visual state #6727
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Simplify Grid definitions, with VerticalGrid and HorizontalGrid #6726

Closed

  • Data entry field tracking list has wrong BindingContext value #5437
    6.0.300
  • [Enhancement] Provide Shell.TitleBarIsVisible #6679
  • [Android] Gesture issue in Tab pages #4979
    6.0.300
  • [Android] Horizontal CollectionView not rendering #4015
    6.0.300
  • Unable to render online image using XAML Image control #6634
  • MAUI clearing storage of app #6641
  • Bindable FlexLayout not sized and visible on Windows #3475
    6.0.300
  • MAUI Blazor Windows Executables Broken ('Microsoft.ui.xaml.dll') #6744
  • [Bug] CollectionView.EmptyView does not render on android #3012
    6.0.300
  • NavigationPage.SetTitleView not rendering properly on Android #6495
    6.0.300
  • [Windows] <CollectionView.Footer> in connection with <SearchBar> #6672
  • [Android] <CollectionView.EmptyView> in connection with <SearchBar> #6671
  • ContentView does not respect IsClippedToBounds (does not clip children) #6656
  • [Android][WSA] PresentationMode=Modal in Shell with rendering problem of statusbar #6745
  • ¤ Target current Blazor web app to windows and android #6704
  • OnIdiom issue with Windows #5014
    6.0.300
  • FontImageSource is not displayed on Android, works in Windows. #6693
  • Custom font cannot work for Android on RC2 #6712
  • [Question] async void in MAUI Essentials samples #6655
  • [Android] Remove all uses of Styleable arrays inside the .NET MAUI code #4889
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • [Windows] Crash using a CollectionView inside a RefreshView #4114
    6.0.300
  • Failed to connect to localhost/127.0.0.1:7020 #6705
  • Clipping is still not working #6260
    6.0.300
  • Delete overlapping ColorExtension properties from Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Compatibility.Platform.iOS #4601
  • AVCaptureDevice.DevicesWithMediaType(AVMediaTypes.Video.ToString()); returns null #6728
  • App Crash From Multiple Theme Switches #5848
    6.0.300
  • Grid Column and RowSpacing don't display in the colour of its parent #4946
    6.0.300
  • [Blazor] libman libraries not included in first build #6709
  • Improve the Migration guide #6724
  • MAUI - Publish brand new project produces errors #6719
  • FlyoutPage Navigation Pane #6157
    6.0.300-servicing

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix margin related measuring with CV #6762
  • Fix various measure/layout issues with android flyout #6759
    area/layout 🔲
  • Revert "Add VC Redist dependency to Windows templates" #6758
    platform/windows 🪟, area/publishing 🏁
  • Android WebAuthenticator fallback to system browser if Chrome Custom tabs are not available #6743
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Ensure glide targets run once #6739
    area/setup 🪄
  • Bump Xamarin.GooglePlayServices.Maps from 117.0.0 to 118.0.2 #6737
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22229.1 to 7.0.0-preview1.22230.1 #6736
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • Rework use of ObtainStyledAttributes so we can enable `AndroidLinkResources` #4912
    t/enhancement ☀️, platform/android 🤖, area/app-size 🤏, area/perf 🏎️, 6.0.300-rc.3

  • [Android] Fix issue with View as EmptyView of CollectionView #6756

    area/a11y
  • Clean up the windows code a bit #6501
    platform/windows 🪟, area/hosting 🧩, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • Fix Newtonsoft.Json assembly version conflict warning in Resizetizer.UnitTests.csproj #6741
  • Fix incorrect clipping using RoundRectangleGeometry #5708
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • Remove iOS Compat ColorExtension ToUIColor overlap #5854
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/migration 🚚
  • Avoid notify changes from a null or disposed control #6060
    t/bug, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮

Updated

  • Remove remaining asserts from PR 6237 #6686

  • [Windows] Implement Windows Platform Specifics #5855

  • Add svg to default copied bundle items for mac/ios #4863
    6.0.300
  • [Android] Update the adapter used by RecyclerViewScrollListener #6601

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Scaffolding: Disable skip navigations flag #27930
  • Warn when FK and and navigation nullability are inconsistent #27925

Closed

  • Investigate IValueBufferFactoryFactory #15914
    7.0.0
  • How to handle DateTime with Unix timestamps in SQLite #27872
  • LINQ expression could not be translated #27870
  • Enabling stricter workflows for destructive migrations #27897
  • System.InvalidOperationException: The expression 'r' is invalid inside an 'Include' operation, since it does not represent a property access #27873

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump Microsoft.Data.SqlClient and SQLitePCLRaw #27932
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Query: Translate aggregate over grouping element in separate pass #27931
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.OData from 8.0.8 to 8.0.10 #27929
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Always use explicit SQL Server schema in reverse engineered models #27924

Merged

  • Remove ValueBuffer from update pipeline #27898
    auto-merge

Updated

  • Add creation and disposal to connection interception #27920
